title: face it, old league was garbage. coming from somebody who's been here since 2013.
body:
The gameplay was unbalanced. (far worse than any problems we have today).

The character designs were garbage. (swords on boots lmao).

The voice acting was like nails on a chalkboard.

The map, and the artstyle in general looked like piss and vomit. (old splash arts were literally just in-game models posed in a fancy lighting engine. not for chinese splash arts tho).

the game is, in a way, better than it's ever been. as contrarian as it sounds.
